mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(mem_id, trv_id, brd_tt, brd_ct) VALUES (#{memId}, #{trvId}, #{brdTt}, #{brdCt})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL(d.like_yn, 'N') AS likeYn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id LEFT JOIN likes d ON a.brd_id = d.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId} WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' ORDER BY brdDt

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL((SELECT d.like_yn FROM likes d WHERE d.brd_id = a.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId}), 'N') AS likeYn, -- 좋아요 여부 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt -- 전체 좋아요 수 FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' AND (#{keyWord} IS NULL OR a.brd_tt LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR c.trv_pc LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR a.tag LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%') ORDER BY brdDt

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL((SELECT d.like_yn FROM likes d WHERE d.brd_id = a.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId}), 'N') AS likeYn, -- 좋아요 여부 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt -- 전체 좋아요 수 FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' AND (#{keyWord} IS NULL OR a.brd_tt LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR c.trv_pc LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR a.tag LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%') AND a.mem_id = #{memId} ORDER BY brdDt

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL((SELECT d.like_yn FROM likes d WHERE d.brd_id = a.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId}), 'N') AS likeYn, -- 좋아요 여부 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt -- 전체 좋아요 수 FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id JOIN likes l ON a.brd_id = l.brd_id WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' AND l.like_yn = 'Y' -- 좋아요가 'Y'인 게시물만 선택 AND l.mem_id = #{memId}-- 특정 사용자가 좋아요를 누른 게시물 필터 AND (#{keyWord} IS NULL OR a.brd_tt LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR c.trv_pc LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR a.tag LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%') ORDER BY a.brdDt

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL((SELECT d.like_yn FROM likes d WHERE d.brd_id = a.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId}), 'N') AS likeYn, -- 좋아요 여부 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt -- 전체 좋아요 수 FROM board a, board_img b, travel c WHERE a.brd_id = b.brd_id AND a.trv_id = c.trv_id AND b.brd_idx = '1' AND a.mem_id = #{memId} ORDER BY brdDt

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1, NVL(d.like_yn, 'N') AS likeYn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.brd_id = a.brd_id AND likes.like_yn = 'Y') AS cnt FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id JOIN likes d ON a.brd_id = d.brd_id AND d.mem_id = #{memId} AND d.like_yn = 'Y' WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' ORDER BY brdDt

SELECT T.mem_id, T.trv_pc, SUBSTR(t.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, T.trv_id, T.trv_x, T.trv_y, B.count, B.brd_id, B.brd_tt, TO_CHAR(B.brdDt, 'YYYY.MM.DD. HH24:MI') brdDt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(B.brd_ct, 4000, 1) brd_ct, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '1' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img1, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '2' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img2, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '3' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img3 FROM TRAVEL T JOIN BOARD B ON T.trv_id = B.trv_id LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON B.brd_id = I.brd_id WHERE B.brd_id = #{brdId} GROUP BY T.mem_id, T.trv_id, T.trv_pc, T.trv_x, T.trv_y, B.count, B.brd_id, B.brd_tt, B.brdDt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(B.brd_ct, 4000, 1)

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(brd_id, rpy_id, mem_id, rpy_ct) VALUES(#{brdId}, #{rpyId}, #{memId}, #{rpyCt})

SELECT a.rpy_id, b.mem_id, a.brd_id, b.mem_nm, b.mem_img, a.rpy_ct, TO_CHAR(a.rpy_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD. HH24:MI') rpyDt FROM reply a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.brd_id = #{brdId} ORDER BY rpyDt

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES(mem_id, brd_id, like_yn) VALUES(#{memId}, #{brdId}, 'Y')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE brd_id = #{brdId} AND mem_id = #{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.rpy_id) AS rpycnt FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN REPLY r ON b.brd_id = r.brd_id WHERE b.brd_id = #{brdId} -- 여기에 특정 게시글 ID를 바인딩 GROUP BY b.brd_id, b.brd_tt
mapper.update: UPDATE board set count = count + 1 WHERE brd_id = #{brdId}
